statement.p: In 46.15 of the last 26 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{26}}={0.4615}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{26}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4615}\cdot{26}={11.999}. We round that as requested to 12 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
